content: brrr is it cold outside this quick and easy beanie pattern is just what you need to keep your head cozy and warm with just one skein of yarn and basic stitches you can create your new favorite beanie in no time the pattern comes in three adult sizes don t worry thanks to the easy instructions you can customize it to fit any size perfectly click here 1 for the english pattern of the sedge beanie klik hier 2 voor het nederlandse patroon van de sedge muts 1 https //free-crochet-patterns com/free-crochet-pattern-sedge-beanie/ 2 https //haakinformatie nl/patroon/kleding/muts/haakpatroon-sedge-muts/
